Action.author: scottz
Action.body: The simple cc used by nwo integration tests does in fact use an init function with two key-value pairs, i.e., "init","a","100","b","200". I think we can close this task, as there is not much we can do of much value. Later when the init function goes away, the existing code will have to be rewritten anyways to add a list of key-value pairs with a single transaction using function such as "addpairs".

Action.author: scottz
Action.body: This is partially implemented already. Not much more we can do, and not worth adding another test for an empty string value.
